abstract: Merrill Lynch is subpoenaing an Internet service provider and Microsoft to identify the sender of “explicit racial remarks” in e-mail messages to black investment bankers within the company, a spokesman for the investment bank said.
lead_paragraph: Merrill Lynch is subpoenaing an Internet service provider and Microsoft to identify the sender of “explicit racial remarks” in e-mail messages to black investment bankers within the company, a spokesman for the investment bank said.

headline.main: Merrill Lynch Sues Over Racist E-Mails
